/usr/lib64/ccache/c++   -std=gnu++11 -Wno-conversion-null -O2 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/bsdftest.dir/src/tools/bsdftest.cpp.o  -o bsdftest -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ccp4/lib: libpbrt.a -lpthread src/ext/openexr/OpenEXR/IlmImf/libIlmImf.a src/ext/openexr/IlmBase/Imath/libImath.a src/ext/openexr/IlmBase/Half/libHalf.a src/ext/glog/libglog.a src/ext/ptex/src/ptex/libPtex.a /opt/ccp4/lib/libz.so src/ext/openexr/IlmBase/IlmThread/libIlmThread.a src/ext/openexr/IlmBase/Iex/libIex.a -lpthread -lpthread /opt/ccp4/lib/libz.so
